isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Engine Electrical - Inspect

svcproc.title: Inspect Wiring Harness, Connectors, and Electrical Components

step1.para: Inspect each wiring harness for corrosion (green, gray, or white deposits), female connector sleeves that are spread open, and terminal pins that are pushed back relative to the other terminals in the same connector. Clean, repair, or replace connectors and terminals if necessary.
Inspect each wiring harness for wear and heat damage to wiring and connectors. Repair or replace if necessary.
Replace any broken harness connection points and zip ties.
Inspect connector pins on all electrical components. If any pins are bent or pushed in, repair or replace component.
Inspect electrical sensors, actuators, and valves for cracks and damage. Replace damaged components if necessary.

note.para: See EGES-370 Diagnostic Manual for further inspection and repair of engine electrical components and systems.
